member.name: T:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter
member.summary: Contains methods to render a as a PDF document.

member.name: M:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.SaveAsPDF(VectSharp.Document,System.String,VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.TextOptions,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption)
member.summary: Save the document to a PDF file.
member.param: The full path to the file to save. If it exists, it will be overwritten.
Defines whether the used fonts should be included in the file.
Indicates whether the streams in the PDF file should be compressed.

A dictionary associating element tags to link targets. If this is provided, objects that have been drawn with a tag contained in the dictionary will become hyperlink to the destination specified in the dictionary. If the destination starts with a hash (#), it is interpreted as the tag of another object in the current document; otherwise, it is interpreted as an external URI.
Defines how and whether image filters should be rasterised when rendering the image.

member.name: T:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.TextOptions
member.summary: Defines whether the used fonts should be included in the file.

member.name: F:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.TextOptions.SubsetFonts
member.summary: Embeds subsetted font files containing only the glyphs for the characters that have been used.

member.name: F:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.TextOptions.ConvertIntoPaths
member.summary: Does not embed any font file and converts all text items into paths.

member.name: T:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption
member.summary: Determines how and whether image filters are rasterised.

member.name: T:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption.FilterOperations
member.summary: Defines whether image filters should be rasterised or not.

member.name: F:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption.FilterOperations.RasteriseAll
member.summary: Image filters will always be rasterised.

member.name: F:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption.FilterOperations.IgnoreAll
member.summary: All image filters will be ignored.

member.name: F:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption.FilterOperations.SkipAll
member.summary: All the images that should be drawn with a filter will be ignored.

member.name: P:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption.Operation
member.summary: Defines whether image filters should be rasterised or not.

member.name: P:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption.RasterisationResolution
member.summary: The resolution that will be used to rasterise image filters. Depending on the value of , this can either be an absolute resolution (i.e. a size in pixel), or a scale factor that is applied to the image size in graphics units.

member.name: P:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption.RasterisationResolutionRelative
member.summary: Determines whether the value of is absolute (i.e. a size in pixel), or relative (i.e. a scale factor that is applied to the image size in graphics units).

member.name: F:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption.Default
member.summary: The default options for image filter rasterisation.

member.name: M:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption.#ctor(VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption.FilterOperations,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.param: Defines whether image filters should be rasterised or not.

The resolution that will be used to rasterise image filters. Depending on the value of , this can either be an absolute resolution (i.e. a size in pixel), or a scale factor that is applied to the image size in graphics units.
Determines whether the value of is absolute (i.e. a size in pixel), or relative (i.e. a scale factor that is applied to the image size in graphics units).

member.name: M:VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.SaveAsPDF(VectSharp.Document,System.IO.Stream,VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.TextOptions,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},VectSharp.PDF.PDFContextInterpreter.FilterOption)
member.summary: Save the document to a PDF stream.
member.param: The stream to which the PDF data will be written.
Defines whether the used fonts should be included in the file.
Indicates whether the streams in the PDF file should be compressed.

A dictionary associating element tags to link targets. If this is provided, objects that have been drawn with a tag contained in the dictionary will become hyperlink to the destination specified in the dictionary. If the destination starts with a hash (#), it is interpreted as the tag of another object in the current document; otherwise, it is interpreted as an external URI.
Defines how and whether image filters should be rasterised when rendering the image.
